title: Don't waste your precious money on any 3.0 pen drives.
body: Don't waste your precious money on any 3.0 pen drives. (When Transfering into the Pen drive) Let me tell you the truth, for the first 10sec speed is 60-66MBps then the next 10sec it is 20-27MBps and finally 15MBps will be the only transfer speed which you will get. So the conclusion is AVERAGE SPEED= 15MBps for a expensive 3.0 pen drives and this is true for all as i have tested multiple pendrives.  (transfering from pen drive) You will get a constant speed of 150MBps no matter how hot is your Pendrive. Plastic pendrives may melt due to high temperature.
